body.name: Smart Watch for Women (Alexa Built-in & Bluetooth Call), 1.8" Smartwatch with SpO2/Heart Rate/Sleep/Stress Monitor, Calorie/Step/Distance Counter, 100 Sport Modes, IP68 Fitness Watch for Android iOS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 43 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 43 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 【Make/Answer Calls & Built-in Alexa】With Bluetooth connectivity, you can answer, reject or make calls on the smart watch to stay in touch with family and friends anytime, anywhere. The smart watches for women also have the Alexa voice assistant built in, so you can set alarms, check the weather, control music and more with voice commands. You can also receive notifications from your smartphone, including SMS, Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram and more

【All-Day Heart Rate/SpO2/Sleep Track】The watches for women can help us understand our health by monitoring heart rate, blood oxygen (SpO2) and stress in real time. The fitness watch also automatically monitors your sleep status at night and provides a comprehensive analysis of sleep quality (deep sleep, light sleep and wakefulness) to help you develop good sleep habits. You can view the previous week's health analysis in the VeryFit app to help you lead a healthier lifestyle

【100 Sports Modes & IP68 Waterproof】The smartwatch has more than 100 sport modes, you can choose the sport mode on the ladies smart watch according to your own preferences and sport needs, such as walking, running, football, cycling and other sports, the digital watch will track your steps, exercise duration, distance and calorie consumption. The Android smart watch is also IP68 waterproof, so you don't need to take it off to wash your hands or in the rain, making it easy to use on a daily basis

【1.8" touch screen & customisable dial】The womens smart watch is equipped with a new generation 1.8" HD touch screen, which greatly improves colour quality and touch responsiveness, making it easy to use various functions. 5 levels of adjustable brightness make it easy to read the time and data even in bright light. With up to 100 watch faces to choose from in the VeryFit" app, you can also customise the watch face of your sports watch to express your personality

【Multi-functional intelligent assistant】This smartwatch women has a variety of daily practical functions such as weather forecast, music control, camera control, mobile phone find, sedentary reminder, etc., which help us live a more convenient, smarter and healthier life. Powered by a 300mAh high-capacity battery, the fitness tracker can be fully charged in just 2 hours, providing approximately 7 days of daily use. Compatible with most smartphones with iOS 9.0+ and Android 6.0+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing watch for the price!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this watch. It's comfortable, stylish does all the things. So easy to set up. Great features. I love being able to see My steps my calories and the time All in one little screen it is very easy to move and navigate. I'm not the person to spend hundreds and thousands of dollars on electronics this is perfect for me and it doesn't break my wallet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This watch is definitely worth the price
reviews.reviewText: It has a huge selection of sports. I picked this one just for kayaking. I can't wat to try it in the summer. The alarm is no nice to wake up to. The sleep monitoring is a really neat feature. I set the watch to remind me to drink water every 30min. It's brilliant!! Counting my steps is really fun. I'm wearing it to the gym tomorrow and I've added all the exercises that I do there. I'm really excited to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this watch last week. I also got an email from vendor with helpful information and instructions on setting the watch up. I am in my 70's and it was easy to set up.I can answer phone calls and talk from both my watch or iPhone and can see text messages and other notices that I set up with notification dings.Runs like a computer. This is my 1st smart watch. I feel the screen is a little large for my wrist but I am getting used to it. I think the price is great for all that this smart watch does. I am still learning about other functions but so far I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch and easy to figure out how to use!
reviews.reviewText: I really love this watch so far. It's been easy to set up and use so far. Enjoying the sleep app although it will register that I'm sleeping even if I'm laying in bed awake. Very happy I decided to try this watch!! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of time and money
reviews.reviewText: Using the keyboard to make a call is EXTREMELY hard. I hit the right key but the watch insisted I hit another one. I had to try over and over to make one call and I don't know why the watch decides you've hit 1 when in fact you've hit the # key -- and those keys are at opposite corners of the keyboard. My BPM and heart rate made it appear I'm barely alive. I tried the running and walking part of the app and both were totally wrong. It said I took steps while I was sitting down. The glitchy screen often ignored my swipes in every direction. There we very few choices for the watch's face. When you go to an app that's on the watch, it stays lighted for only a couple of seconds. And oh my goodness, the battery! It drained SUPER fast. As you might guess, I'm returning it. I can't afford an Apple watch and I'm done shopping for the cheap ones, so my wrist will continue to be naked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little confusing to set up.
reviews.reviewText: It took me a little bit to get things set with linking to my phone. But once I got things working I have enjoyed it. Like the find my phone feature. Misplaced my phone while out touring, was able to locate it under the seat of my vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My 3rd veryfit watch. Not thrilled. It’s noisy & messes up Siri
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd veryfit watch. I really enjoyed my 2 previous watches (they were replaced after being well used & abused for a few years). I do NOT like this watch. The watch face choices and limited (unless you want to pay for them). It ‘dings’ loudly EVERY TIME I GET A NOTIFICATION, and IT SCREWS UP SIRI! When I try to use Siri, the watch automatically comes on and I have to talk TO THE WATCH (talking to my wrist like a bad 1970’s spy movie). Even then it doesn’t correctly pick up what I said! I’ve turned off Siri in the veryfit app and even turned off Bluetooth for the watch. It auto connects to my phone again, and I can’t talk to my phone/call/text anyone unless I turn the watch OFF. When Siri comes on, my iPhone 14pro max seems to be at war with the watch, Siri misses words, or stops mid process. Also the dings are a problem because I have to keep everything on silent/vibrate for work and I haven’t found a way to make it shut up! I may return it and buy another watch of my old version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: Love my IDW19 smart watch. App is very user friendly and battery life is much longer than Apple smart watch. So thankful I took the chance and ordered it.
L'orologio e molto bello esteticamente e l'audio per le chiamate sono molto chiare.Notifica SMS e chiamate top!

Ich hatte nicht viel erwartet, ich benötige die Uhr eigentlich nur, um mein Handy, das meist stumm geschaltet ist, nicht zu überhören. Dies funktioniert sehr gut und inzwischen nutze ich auch andere Features. Dass bei den Sportarten auch Hula Hoop dabei ist, welche ich gerne mache, motiviert sehr zum täglichen üben. Der Schlaftracker scheint auch relativ genau zu sein. Alles in allem bin ich sehr zufrieden!

Cette montre ressemble à une Apple watch- donne l’heure- fonction podomètre- fonction rythme cardiaque / oxygène sang- répond aux appels- le top c’est qu’elle tient plusieurs jours sans besoin d’être chargée ! Et ça c’est mieux que Apple !!!Bon rapport qualité prix
I love my new watch, I can have a personal picture displayed, I can track my step count, and it even lets me know my stress levels.. Great price for a great product. ❤️
